name: Not William Tell
description:
This game was made for Zero Hour Game Jam 2021. Nearly everything in the game is made within the one hour time limit, only the fonts was premade.

The gameplay is a really simple and it's just a game where you have to shoot as many apples, as you can before the timer runs out.

Controls:

  • Click with the mouse to shot the falling apples.
  • Alt+F4 to close the game

Good luck and have fun
